meanings.sent1: I love to bake brownies for my friends.
meanings.sent2: Mom made delicious brownies for our picnic.
meanings.sent3: The brownies disappeared quickly at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The smell of freshly baked brownies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The gooey chocolate brownies were a hit at the party.

meanings.sent1: The storybook was filled with tales of mischievous brownies.
meanings.sent2: Legends say brownies help with household chores.
meanings.sent3: The brownies were blamed for hiding the keys.
meanings.sent4: In the fairy tale, the brownies granted wishes to kind children.
meanings.sent5: The old castle was said to be haunted by friendly brownies.

meanings.definition: A member of the Girl Guides or Girl Scouts organization
meanings.sent1: My sister is excited to become a Brownie this year.
meanings.sent2: The Brownies went on a nature hike to earn a badge.
meanings.sent3: The Brownies sang songs around the campfire.
meanings.sent4: The Brownies helped clean up the park as part of their service project.
meanings.sent5: The Brownies wore their uniforms proudly during the parade.
